import { Component, TemplateRef } from '@angular/core'; import { BsModalService, BsModalRef } from 'ngx-bootstrap/modal'; interface produto { nome:string, preco: string, categoria:string, descricao: string } @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { }
